entry.title: Re @ProfYYadav1 @SenatorHagerty .@SenatorHagerty: "...There have only been 2 minor rule-making activities by the SEC and the CFTC while there have bee...
entry.summary: Re @ProfYYadav1 @SenatorHagerty .@SenatorHagerty: "...There have only been 2 minor rule-making activities by the SEC and the CFTC while there have been 30 of these retroactive litigation cases at the SEC and 18 at the CFTC. That is not the way to run things in a hindward looking, piecemeal basis..."
